subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Eli Marrero, acquired from the Colorado Rockies on Friday in a trade for Kazuo Matsui, has never played a professional inning at third base but the Mets demand versatility from their bench players.
snippet: Eli Marrero, acquired from the Colorado Rockies on Friday in a trade for Kazuo Matsui, has never played a professional inning at third base but the Mets demand versatility from their bench players.
